actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Budget.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Finance (without written report).
Reported to Senate from the Committeee on the Budget, S. Rept. 95-1309.

official_title: A Resolution waiving section 303 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to consideration of an amendment intended to be proposed by Mr. Kennedy (for himself and other Senators to H.R. 13511.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of an amendment to H.R. 13511 (Refundable investment tax credit).

titles.title: A Resolution waiving section 303 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to consideration of an amendment intended to be proposed by Mr. Kennedy (for himself and other Senators to H.R. 13511.
